channel.title: Runescape help
channel.description: ok well im getting back into runescape 'abit' and thinking of makeing a skiller but he be a non member for the time being could some give me some advise on what skillz to get up and merchant ? ps merchanting ant a skill its a talent :p

item.title: Runescape help
item.dc:creator: @kombo kombo
item.description:
@kombo wrote:

i have some good ideas! here i think im gonna mine- then runecraft pure profit

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape help
item.dc:creator: @M0rtion M0rtion
item.description:
@M0rtion wrote:

Woodcutting :). As sharks have gone down in price, dramaticly.
Craftin is a good option aswell, power ammys etc…

I don’t merc items from skilling as there price can go up or down overnight.

I browse the forums in the miscelanious for bank sales and buy anything that i think is good in my opinion ( Eg rune axes / picks / (g) items that are cheep.

If you have a friend/ access to members i recently brought 1350 saphire rings for 500 ea, then sold them world 18 edge bank for 1.5k ea, thats like Over 2mil.

You could also try mercing sara plates, not a bad thing to merc.

In my opinion, you just gotta know what people want!!

-Mort

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape help
item.dc:creator: @Ca1lum Ca1lum
item.description:
@Ca1lum wrote:

merchant ess than pure ess… buy 10k p ess 100ea sell 110 tht is 100k earned and unlike whips u only need 1mil to start and it is alot easyer to buy and i know a guy who buys 100k’s of P-ess and he turns ALOT.
A simple thing can earn alot of money. Merchant things that are in demand but nothin that goes to up and down or you can lose money.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape help
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

Yeah id say get about 20m by doing what zoltan said then start merching D chains and Red H-ween masks. Those are pretty good to merch.

If you need something to merch before that, start out by buying whips for 1.5m then selling for 1.6m while you wc or fish so youre not wasting time.

Im currently working on a skiller too, so if you need any advice, just pm The Nxt God on rs.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape help
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Well, I had an old skiller before. I had been training fishing, then RCing. Later once I had alot of runes. I would sell em, same goes for fish. Then merchant Yew logs. I got my way upto 20 mill in about a month. It took a while since I wasn’t a member. It’s totally easier that way.

Read full topic
